summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Supreme Detail Studio SEO implementation. All city pages load correctly with proper Georgia SEO meta tags and structured data. Minor navigation and theme detection issues found.

ui_bugs.issue: SERVICES dropdown menu not clickable - element visibility timeout

design_issues.issue: Dark theme class not detected on body/main elements
design_issues.note: Visual dark theme appears to be working, but CSS class detection failed

passed_tests: Meta tags contain Georgia references (Marietta, GA)
All 9 city pages load without errors
Each city page has proper SEO title tags with city names
Structured data (JSON-LD) present on all city pages
No Kentucky references found on any pages
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix SERVICES navigation dropdown visibility issue. Consider adding explicit dark theme CSS classes for better theme detection. Add REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL to frontend/.env if backend integration is needed.
